thread.title: Beyoncé's Isolated Vocals for Her Grammy Performance Prove She's Even Better Live
thread.title_full: Beyoncé's Isolated Vocals for Her Grammy Performance Prove She's Even Better Live | Complex

author: Zach Frydenlund
title: Beyoncé's Isolated Vocals for Her Grammy Performance Prove She's Even Better Live
text:
Beyoncé's Isolated Vocals for Her Grammy Performance Prove She's Even Better Live By Zach Frydenlund Follow Zach on Twitter for jokes and hot takes here . 
  Despite the fact that Beyoncé was snubbed in the major categories at the Grammys on Sunday night , there's no denying that her performance stole the show . Like, her set was amazing, but with Beyoncé that's expected. If you're like us and still replaying the performance days later, we have a special treat today: a video of Bey's performance with the vocals isolated.
The result is a beautiful rendition of "Love Drought" and "Sandcastles" that's somehow even better than the original set. The stunning vocals are truly breathtaking and might actually make you stop what you're doing and take a moment. Praise to Beyoncé for always delivering. 
  Slay, Bey. 

Related Adele Praises Beyoncé in Acceptance Speech for Album of the Year: 'My Artist of My Life Is Beyoncé' Solange Co-Signs Frank Ocean's Grammy Diss After Adele Beats Beyoncé Tags: News , Videos , Beyoncé , Grammys
